com.sun.identity.policy.plugins

Class PrivilegeCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.identity.policy.plugins.PrivilegeCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Condition, Cloneable

    public class PrivilegeCondition
extends Object
implements Condition, Cloneable
    A generic condition mapper that maps entitlement conditions to OpenAM conditions.
